data.name: Postimage but better
data.description:
Thought I may as well upload the style I made for myself since there's not many styles for this page. 

Background, bg opacity, and theme colors are customizable.

data.name: nextdoor Dark By BamaBraves
Bing Dark Theme
data.description: This style gives you a full on dark themed experience for bing.com (the official search engine for Windows by Microsoft that comes default on edge).

data.name: Roll20 Correctif pour D&D5E (translated sheet fix)
data.description: Corrige un problème avec l'ajout d'Outil Maîtrisés & Compétence Personnalisées qui masquer les boutons derrière le texte.

data.name: Dark rimworldwiki.com
Green-On-Black Theme for ThePoetLogician
data.description: This is the example CSS code that was given in the March13th2020 Blog Post on thepoetlogician.neocities.org. You can use this theme or make your own.
